id.description: A unique identifier for the chat completion.

choices.description: A list of chat completion choices.

finish_reason.description: The reason why the model stopped generating tokens.

index.description: The index of the choice in the list of choices.

content.description: The content of the chat completion message.

created.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) of when the chat completion was created.

model.description: The model used for the chat completion.

system_fingerprint.description: This fingerprint represents the backend configuration that the model runs with.
